Container.Name: Facet
Container.Overview:
Facet is a self-hosted personal profile platform that lets you create multiple views of your professional profile for different audiences (recruiters, conferences, clients).
You own your data and control what each audience sees.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: The port used to access Facet in your browser. Change this if 8080 is already in use.

Config.Name: Default Login
Config.Description: Default pass for first run: changeme123 (You will be prompted to change immediately after login).

Config.Name: App Data
Config.Description: Database and core configuration storage. Include this path in your appdata backups.

Config.Name: Uploads
Config.Description: Storage for uploaded images and files. Can grow large depending on usage.

Config.Name: Admin Email
Config.Description: Email address for admin access. Required for all authentication methods.

Config.Name: Public URL
Config.Description: Public URL for Facet (e.g. https://facet.yourdomain.com or http://192.168.1.100:8080). Used for OAuth callbacks and share links.

Config.Name: Trust Proxy
Config.Description: Leave enabled if running behind Nginx Proxy Manager, Traefik, Cloudflare Tunnel, or another reverse proxy.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions. Use 99 for Unraid's nobody user, or match your host user's UID.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions. Use 100 for Unraid's users group, or match your host user's GID.

Config.Name: Google Client ID
Config.Description: Client ID for 'Sign in with Google'. Redirect URI: YOUR_URL/api/oauth2-redirect

Config.Name: Google Client Secret
Config.Description: Client secret from Google Cloud Console.

Config.Name: GitHub Client ID
Config.Description: Client ID for 'Sign in with GitHub'. Redirect URI: YOUR_URL/api/oauth2-redirect

Config.Name: GitHub Client Secret
Config.Description: Client secret from GitHub OAuth App settings.

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: Enables AI features such as content rewriting and summaries.

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: Optional alternative to OpenAI using Claude models.

Config.Name: Ollama URL
Config.Description: URL of a local Ollama instance (e.g. http://192.168.1.100:11434).

Config.Name: Ollama Model
Config.Description: Ollama model to use when enabled.

Config.Name: Admin UI (Advanced)
Config.Description: Enables the PocketBase admin UI at /_/ for troubleshooting. Leave disabled unless needed.
